description: M i s c e l l a n y   ( A b r a h a m   b e n   J a c o b   S a b a ' s   E s h k o l   h a - k o f e r ,   a   c o m m e n t a r y   o n   R u t h ;   J o s e p h   C a s p i ' s   H ̣ a t s o t s e r o t   k e s e f ,   a   c o m m e n t a r y   o n   E c c l e s i a s t e s ;   S h e m   T o v   b e n   J o s e p h   b e n   S h e m   T o v   I b n   S h e m   T o v ' s   c o m m e n t a r y   o n   t h e   H a g a d a h )
title: Miscellany (Abraham ben Jacob Saba's Eshkol ha-kofer, a commentary on Ruth; Joseph Caspi's Ḥatsotserot kesef, a commentary on Ecclesiastes; Shem Tov ben Joseph ben Shem Tov Ibn Shem Tov's commentary on the Hagadah)
